org.fcrepo.connector.file

Class FedoraFileSystemConnector

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.modeshape.jcr.spi.federation.Connector
      • org.modeshape.jcr.spi.federation.WritableConnector
        • org.modeshape.connector.filesystem.FileSystemConnector
          • org.fcrepo.connector.file.FedoraFileSystemConnector
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    org.modeshape.jcr.spi.federation.Pageable

    public class FedoraFileSystemConnector
extends org.modeshape.connector.filesystem.FileSystemConnector
    This class extends the FileSystemConnector to enable the autocreation of Fedora-specific datastream and content properties.
    Author:
    Andrew Woods Date: 1/30/14
